channel.title: Diary on Wade's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Diary on Wade's Blog

item.title: 待業日記01
item.description: 半夜醒來，不知道是溫度的影響還是什麼問題？拿了手機點進天氣App。上面顯示的是26度，應該是很好睡覺的溫度，抬頭看了一下冷氣溫度計，顯示房內卻是28度？這是什麼冬涼夏暖的房間嗎？ Recently I have started to learn data analysis in NTUST. Probably this course is for beginners who aren’t familiar with IT. I havent attended classes in a university for a long time.
